descriptions.description: The goal of ldns is to simplify DNS programming, it supports recent RFCs like the DNSSEC documents, and allows developers to easily create software conforming to current RFCs, and experimental software for current Internet Drafts. A secondary benefit of using ldns is speed.

set.commands:
PACKAGE_NAME=ldns PACKAGE_VERSION=1.6.16 oegenv 32 oegcleanbase oegextract ${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}.tar.gz oegimport openssl-1.0.1e oegimport zlib-1.2.8 configure --prefix=${OEG_BASE_DIR} --with-sysroot=${OEG_BASE_DIR} --with-gnu-ld --with-ssl=${OEG_BASE_DIR} --disable-rpath --enable-shared --enable-static oegpatch 001 oegpatch 002 make make install DESTDIR=${OEG_INSTALL_DIR} cd "${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_DIR}" oegarchive ${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}
# Default trust anchor: /open-egovernment/etc/unbound/root.key
oegimport ldns-1.6.16
cd drill configure --prefix=${OEG_BASE_DIR} --with-ssl=${OEG_BASE_DIR} --disable-rpath --with-ldns=${OEG_BASE_DIR} make #make install DESTDIR=${OEG_INSTALL_DIR} # error, chmod has problems cd ..
cp -R .libs lib # no link to the library binary there, we copy it simply cd examples configure --prefix=${OEG_BASE_DIR} --with-ssl=${OEG_BASE_DIR} --disable-rpath --with-ldns=${OEG_BASE_DIR} oegpatch 003 # all examples, added missing functions, changed includes. make #make install DESTDIR=${OEG_INSTALL_DIR} # error, chmod has problems cd ..
